content:

thought: The crafting path for spruce_fence is ['spruce_planks','spruce_fence'], so the next item to craft is spruce_planks. Spruce_planks can be crafted from a stripped_spruce_log, which is present in the inventory at slot 31. Therefore, I will move the stripped_spruce_log into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 31 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: spruce_fence

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

thought: To craft a spruce fence, I need to place three spruce planks and two sticks in the crafting grid. Since there are four spruce planks in slot 11, I will move one to the crafting grid at slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1
